# init(mutating:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new mutable buffer over the same memory as the given buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(mutating bytes: UnsafeRawBufferPointer)
```

## Parameters

- **bytes**: The buffer to convert.
title: init(mutating:)
